cards.rules_text: Search your library for an artifact card, a creature card, an enchantment card, and a planeswalker card, then reveal them. Target opponent chooses three of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the other onto the battlefield.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of nonland permanents.
Search your library for a permanent with converted mana cost equal to the total converted mana cost of permanents sacrificed to cast Long Night in the Lab, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a card exiled with Mad Queen's Contract into your hand.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

Flying
Whenever Grigorhon the Vast enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 8 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast Elder of the Arbor Song.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap each creature you control. Those creatures get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Draw two cards, then exile a card from your hand.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent until Syn, Spectral Empress leaves the battlefield.
[-7]: Destroy all other nonland permanents. You may cast any number of cards exiled with Syn without paying their mana costs.

[+1]: Create three 1/1 black Rogue creature tokens with “This creature can't be blocked” and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage, sacrifice it.”
[0]: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
[-2]: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, that player loses 2 life.

[+1]: Create Offering, a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with “When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.”
[-1]: Each player sacrifices a permanent.
[-3]: Destroy target permanent.

[+1]: Up to one target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains first strike, vigilance, and trample until end of turn.
[0]: Until end of turn, Warleader Grata becomes a 4/4 Human Knight creature with double strike and indestructible. [i](She doesn't lose loyalty while she's not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.”

[+1]: Untap target permanent. It gains hexproof and indestructible until your next turn.
[-3]: Tapped permanents target player controls don't untap during their next untap step.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each phase, untap each permanent you control.”

You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
[+2]: Draw two cards.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent.
[-10]: Your life total becomes 20. Each opponent's life total becomes 1.

Whenever Qinhana Skysailer attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
When Detention Officer enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 4 or less until Detention Officer leaves the battlefield.

When Golem Retainer enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield until Golem Retainer leaves the battlefield. When that artifact would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.

Lifelink
Whenever a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead and you gain 1 life.
Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever target permanent deals damage, you gain that much life.
[-3]: Exile target creature or enchantment.
[-4]: Each player gets an emblem with “You can't cast more than one spell each turn.”

cards.rules_text: Choose an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for instant or sorcery cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Cast those cards without paying their mana costs if able. If those cards would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile them instead.

Counter target spell if it has converted mana cost 1.
Promote {1}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its promote cost. If you do, double all numbers and number words on it. Then exile it.)[/i]

Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]

When Ashscatter Drake enters the battlefield, return target spell to its owner's hand.

As Raveria, Library Sage enters the battlefield, choose a number.
{U}{U}: Counter target spell with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.
